name: Pocket Bomberman
description:
Pocket Bomberman (ポケットボンバーマン, Poketto Bonbāman) is a platforming action game first released for the Game Boy in 1997, and later as a launch title for the Game Boy Color in 1998.

In contrast to the overhead view of other Bomberman titles, Pocket Bomberman features sidescrolling platformer gameplay. Like other Bomberman games, Bomberman must defeat all enemies in each stage to advance. The game features a total of 5 worlds spanning 25 levels. Each world follows a different theme, including forest, underwater, cloudtops and a dark underworld. At the end of each world is a boss fight.
